etomica.chem.models

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.chem.models.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModelChain

    public abstract class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Top-level class for a molecular model.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Model.PotentialAndIterator
      Wrapper class for a Potential and an AtomsetIteratorBasisDependent that is associated with the potential.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Model.PotentialAndIterator[] getPotentials()
      Returns an array of objects wrapping bonding Potentials and the AtomsetIteratorBasisDependents that return atoms appropriate for those potentials.
      ISpecies getSpecies()
      Returns the species associated with this Model, if it has already been created.
      protected abstract void initPotentials(ISimulation sim)
      Internal method to be implemented by subclasses to initialize the intramolecular potentials associated with this model.
      ISpecies makeSpecies(ISimulation sim)
      Creates a species in the given simulation and returns it.
      protected abstract ISpecies makeSpeciesInternal(ISimulation sim)
      Internal method to be implemented by subclasses to create the actual Species object for the given Simulation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model(boolean isDynamic)

    • Method Detail

      • getSpecies

        public ISpecies getSpecies()
        Returns the species associated with this Model, if it has already been created. If the species has not been made yet, getSpecies returns null.

      • makeSpecies

        public final ISpecies makeSpecies(ISimulation sim)
        Creates a species in the given simulation and returns it.

      • makeSpeciesInternal

        protected abstract ISpecies makeSpeciesInternal(ISimulation sim)
        Internal method to be implemented by subclasses to create the actual Species object for the given Simulation.

      • initPotentials

        protected abstract void initPotentials(ISimulation sim)
        Internal method to be implemented by subclasses to initialize the intramolecular potentials associated with this model. Potential objects might be created earlier, but this method gives the subclass an opportunity to create the potentials after the species. This method will only be called after the species has been created.

      • getPotentials

        public abstract Model.PotentialAndIterator[] getPotentials()
        Returns an array of objects wrapping bonding Potentials and the AtomsetIteratorBasisDependents that return atoms appropriate for those potentials.
